items.content_html: Clueless dad in datablitz wants to buy an xbox just so his kid can play minecraft. Asks what the difference is between xbone and 360, datablitz guys give terrible explanations that mean nothing to the guy. In the end he gets a 360 because it’s cheaper. Hope he doesnt RROD
